column4: I have tried to install several programs with synaptic package manager, however, after I download the package I can't find the program in my start menu. What can I do to make them appear in the start menu?

I have tried to install several programs with synaptic package manager, however, after I download the package I can't find the program in my start menu. What can I do to make them appear in the start menu?
not all programs install a shortcut in X all the time, just open a terminal and type the first few letters of the app and tab to auto complete it
Is there a way to create a shortcut?
